      • WhiteSpaceFilterStateMachine.StateChange

        public WhiteSpaceFilterStateMachine.StateChange(WhiteSpaceFilterStateMachine.State newState,
                                        boolean suppressCurrentChar,
                                        byte[] outputBytes)
        Creates a StateChange.
        Parameters:
        newState - the new State.
        suppressCurrentChar - whether the character which triggered the change should be suppressed.
        outputBytes - the data to output on transition to the new state, or null for no output.
